abstract: CoCo Vandeweghe has worked hard to improve her game, and is confident heading into fourth-round match of Wimbledon Tennis Tournament against Lucie Safarova.
lead_paragraph: After a loss last year to the 171st ranked player, Vandeweghe established a regimen to alter her nutritional intake and hone her exercise program, and that took priority over everything. Now, she has a place in the fourth round at Wimbledon.

headline.main: A $530 Motivational Tool That Helped Turn CoCo Vandeweghe Around
headline.print_headline: A $530 Motivational Tool That Helped Turn a Player Around

snippet: After a loss last year to the 171st ranked player, Vandeweghe established a regimen to alter her nutritional intake and hone her exercise program, and that took priority over everything. Now, she has a place in the fourth round at Wimbledon.
